titleStmt.title: The aunswer of Iohn Gough preacher, to Maister Fecknams obiections against his sermon, lately preached in the Tower of London. 15. Ianurie. 1570.
titleStmt.author: Gough, John, fl. 1561-1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdeley, dwellynge in little Britaine streete without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The aunswer of Iohn Gough to M. Fecknams obiections.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
